quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
name: Helen Keller

quote: Life is full of happiness and tears; be strong and have faith.
name: Kareena Kapoor Khan

quote: When you focus on being a blessing, God makes sure that you are always blessed in abundance.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: God will never give you anything you can't handle, so don't stress.
name: Kelly Clarkson

quote: Faith is the bird that feels the light when the dawn is still dark.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: Faith is the strength by which a shattered world shall emerge into the light.
name: Helen Keller

quote: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams.
name: Ben Carson

quote: Observe good faith and justice toward all nations. Cultivate peace and harmony with all.
name: George Washington

quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: Stand straight, walk proud, have a little faith.
name: Garth Brooks

quote: Faith is to believe what you do not see; the reward of this faith is to see what you believe.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: Faith consists in believing when it is beyond the power of reason to believe.
name: Voltaire

quote: Without faith, nothing is possible. With it, nothing is impossible.
name: Mary McLeod Bethune

quote: I am still far from being what I want to be, but with God's help I shall succeed.
name: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Prayer should be the key of the day and the lock of the night.
name: George Herbert

quote: With faith, discipline and selfless devotion to duty, there is nothing worthwhile that you cannot achieve.
name: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: Sometimes life hits you in the head with a brick. Don't lose faith.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: Dare, dream, dance, smile, and sing loudly! And have faith that love is an unstoppable force!
name: Suzanne Brockmann

quote: Pray as though everything depended on God. Work as though everything depended on you.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: Obedience is an act of faith; disobedience is the result of unbelief.
name: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Doubt is a pain too lonely to know that faith is his twin brother.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Happy is the son whose faith in his mother remains unchallenged.
name: Louisa May Alcott

quote: It's lack of faith that makes people afraid of meeting challenges, and I believed in myself.
name: Muhammad Ali

quote: Pray, and let God worry.
name: Martin Luther

quote: To one who has faith, no explanation is necessary. To one without faith, no explanation is possible.
name: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Anyone can be a hero. You just have to have faith in yourself.
name: Masi Oka

quote: Patience and Diligence, like faith, remove mountains.
name: William Penn

quote: A casual stroll through the lunatic asylum shows that faith does not prove anything.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I'm grateful to God for His bountiful gifts... He gave me courage and faith in myself.
name: Loretta Young

quote: Faith crosses every border and touches every heart in every nation.
name: George W. Bush

quote: Faith is a passionate intuition.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: Choose your friends with caution; plan your future with purpose, and frame your life with faith.
name: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Non-violence requires a double faith, faith in God and also faith in man.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: I have great faith in fools; self-confidence my friends call it.
name: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: We are twice armed if we fight with faith.
name: Plato

quote: It's not a faith in technology. It's faith in people.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: In faith there is enough light for those who want to believe and enough shadows to blind those who don't.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: We are never defeated unless we give up on God.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: As long as I have my faith in God, I'm good. I know everything else is going to come.
name: Derrick Rose

quote: Prayer is as natural an expression of faith as breathing is of life.
name: Jonathan Edwards

quote: Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens.
name: J. R. R. Tolkien

quote: Do not tell secrets to those whose faith and silence you have not already tested.
name: Elizabeth I

quote: Faith makes all things possible... love makes all things easy.
name: Dwight L. Moody

quote: Faith and prayer are the vitamins of the soul; man cannot live in health without them.
name: Mahalia Jackson

quote: Physical strength can never permanently withstand the impact of spiritual force.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: My music is the spiritual expression of what I am - my faith, my knowledge, my being.
name: John Coltrane

quote: It is truer to say that martyrs create faith more than faith creates martyrs.
name: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: Keep the faith, don't lose your perseverance and always trust your gut extinct.
name: Paula Abdul

quote: Liberty cannot be established without morality, nor morality without faith.
name: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: Only the person who has faith in himself is able to be faithful to others.
name: Erich Fromm

quote: I gave in, and admitted that God was God.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: If fear is cultivated it will become stronger, if faith is cultivated it will achieve mastery.
name: John Paul Jones

quote: Blind faith in your leaders, or in anything, will get you killed.
name: Bruce Springsteen

quote: Faith must trample under foot all reason, sense, and understanding.
name: Martin Luther

quote: Faith Hill is a big role model.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: Faith is what someone knows to be true, whether they believe it or not.
name: Flannery O'Connor

quote: Non-violence is the article of faith.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Faith has to do with things that are not seen and hope with things that are not at hand.
name: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Sometimes you find your strongest faith in the darkest corners.
name: Margo Price

quote: A library implies an act of faith.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: I don't think you ever really know what all you're doing, so you have to act on faith.
name: Dolly Parton

quote: I die the king's faithful servant, but God's first.
name: Thomas More

quote: He who has courage and faith will never perish in misery!
name: Anne Frank

quote: Faith is a knowledge within the heart, beyond the reach of proof.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Sometimes all you need is a big leap of faith.
name: Sean Bean

quote: Keep your faith in God, but keep your powder dry.
name: Oliver Cromwell

quote: Faith is much better than belief. Belief is when someone else does the thinking.
name: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: Love, hope, fear, faith - these make humanity; These are its sign and note and character.
name: Robert Browning

quote: Faith goes out through the window when beauty comes in at the door.
name: George Edward Moore

quote: Creativity is always a leap of faith. You're faced with a blank page, blank easel, or an empty stage.
name: Julia Cameron

quote: Each one prays to God according to his own light.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Faith is an oasis in the heart which will never be reached by the caravan of thinking.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: But the attitude of faith is to let go, and become open to truth, whatever it might turn out to be.
name: Alan Watts

quote: My faith helps me overcome such negative emotions and find my equilibrium.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: I don't have to have faith, I have experience.
name: Joseph Campbell

quote: Your faithfulness makes you trustworthy to God.
name: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Obedience is the fruit of faith.
name: Christina Rossetti

quote: And the attitude of faith is the very opposite of clinging to belief, of holding on.
name: Alan Watts

quote: Be a sinner and sin strongly, but more strongly have faith and rejoice in Christ.
name: Martin Luther

quote: It takes vision and courage to create - it takes faith and courage to prove.
name: Owen D. Young

quote: My faith helps me understand that circumstances don't dictate my happiness, my inner peace.
name: Denzel Washington

quote: Everything I am I owe to my faith and secondly to parents who were old school.
name: J. C. Watts

quote: Faith is a state of openness or trust.
name: Alan Watts

quote: Reason is our soul's left hand, faith her right.
name: John Donne

quote: The future is as bright as your faith.
name: Thomas S. Monson

quote: I learned early on the magic of life is having a vision, having faith, and then going for it.
name: Elaine Welteroth

quote: We have one life; it soon will be past; what we do for God is all that will last.
name: Charles Studd

quote: Ultimately, blind faith is the only kind.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: God always takes the simplest way.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Faith is about trusting God when you have unanswered questions.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: Faith: not wanting to know what is true.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Now, God be praised, that to believing souls gives light in darkness, comfort in despair.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: The faith that stands on authority is not faith.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Writing is an act of faith, not a trick of grammar.
name: E. B. White

quote: Faith is not something to grasp, it is a state to grow into.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Unity in faith is theocracy; unity in politics is fascism.
name: Maajid Nawaz

quote: Nonviolence is the first article of my faith. It is also the last article of my creed.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Faith gives you an inner strength and a sense of balance and perspective in life.
name: Gregory Peck

quote: Every tomorrow has two handles. We can take hold of it with the handle of anxiety or the handle of faith.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Love, like a chicken salad or restaurant hash, must be taken with blind faith or it loses its flavor.

quote: Don't let the winds blow your dreams away... or steal your faith in God.
name: Vin Scully

quote: Not brute force but only persuasion and faith are the kings of this world.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Faith is an island in the setting sun, But proof is the bottom line for everyone.
name: Paul Simon

quote: There is greatness in the fear of God, contentment in faith of God, and honour in humility.

quote: If you have a particular faith or religion, that is good. But you can survive without it.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: It's faith in something and enthusiasm for something that makes a life worth living.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: Faith is trust in ultimate meaning.
name: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: I have tremendous faith in God that all things happen for a reason, even if we don't understand.
name: Terri Irwin

quote: Belief in a cruel God makes a cruel man.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: And Jesus, the heart of the Christian faith is the wildest, most radical guy you'd ever come across.
name: Bear Grylls

quote: As reason is a rebel to faith, so passion is a rebel to reason.
name: Thomas Browne

quote: Faith activates God - Fear activates the Enemy.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: God... a being whose only definition is that he is beyond man's power to conceive.
name: Ayn Rand

quote: Love, we say, is life; but love without hope and faith is agonizing death.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: God may not guide us in an obvious way because he wants us to make decisions based on faith and character.

quote: When faith is lost, when honor dies, the man is dead.
name: John Greenleaf Whittier

quote: Faith is not believing that God can. It is knowing that God will.
name: Ben Stein

quote: Resist your fear; fear will never lead to you a positive end. Go for your faith and what you believe.

quote: Faith is deliberate confidence in the character of God whose ways you may not understand at the time.
name: Oswald Chambers

quote: I see heaven's glories shine and faith shines equal.
name: Emily Bronte

quote: Faith is an aptitude of the spirit. It is, in fact, a talent: you must be born with it.
name: Anton Chekhov

quote: The only answer to fear is faith in God, knowing He loves you unconditionally and individually.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: Have faith in God. It will make you dig deeper and become a better leader.
name: Anne F. Beiler

quote: I must have had faith that day. When I went out, I was Henry Fonda again. An unemployed actor but a man.

quote: The principle part of faith is patience.
name: George MacDonald

quote: I am totally convinced the Christian faith is the most coherent worldview around.
name: Ravi Zacharias

quote: Bigotry toward any faith community cannot have any place in civilized society anywhere in the world.

quote: I have faith in the judicial system.
name: Clarence Clemons

quote: Skepticism, riddling the faith of yesterday, prepared the way for the faith of tomorrow.
name: Romain Rolland

quote: We can no more do without spirituality than we can do without food, shelter, or clothing.
name: Ernest Holmes

quote: That is the definition of faith - acceptance of that which we imagine to be true, that which we cannot prove.
name: Dan Brown

quote: I hold that religion and faith are two different things.
name: Pat Buckley

quote: Let those who, still in their youth, have preserved their faith and fullness of hope, keep looking up.
name: George A. Smith

quote: The love of heaven makes one heavenly.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Faith, there hath been many great men that have flattered the people who ne'er loved them.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: God enters by a private door into every individual.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: To Follow by faith alone is to follow blindly.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Our faith comes in moments; our vice is habitual.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Faith... must be enforced by reason... when faith becomes blind it dies.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The smallest seed of faith is better than the largest fruit of happiness.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The way to see by Faith is to shut the Eye of Reason.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Faith never makes a confession.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Intolerance betrays want of faith in one's cause.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: In the affairs of this world, men are saved not by faith, but by the want of it.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Faith is permitting ourselves to be seized by the things we do not see.
name: Martin Luther

quote: Faith keeps many doubts in her pay. If I could not doubt, I should not believe.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: If faith is lost, there is no security and there is no life for him who does not adhere to religion.

quote: Fear of death makes us devoid both of valour and religion. For want of valour is want of religious faith.

quote: Only he can take great resolves who has indomitable faith in God and has fear of God.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The great moral powers of the soul are faith, hope, and love.
name: Ellen G. White

quote: Painting is a faith, and it imposes the duty to disregard public opinion.
name: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: But for my faith in God, I should have been a raving maniac.

quote: Faith moves mountains, but you have to keep pushing while you are praying.

quote: I wish everybody finds the serenity that good, strong faith brings.

quote: God didn't make a mistake when He made you. You need to see yourself as God sees you.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: You know, my faith is one that admits some doubt.

quote: Doubt is not the opposite of faith; it is one element of faith.
name: Paul Tillich

quote: There is but one cause of human failure. And that is man's lack of faith in his true Self.
name: William James

quote: I live and love in God's peculiar light.
name: Michelangelo

quote: You were made by God and for God, and until you understand that, life will never make sense.
name: Rick Warren

quote: I'm a strong man of faith.
name: Darryl Glenn

quote: Faith in oneself is the best and safest course.
name: Michelangelo

quote: To believe in God is impossible not to believe in Him is absurd.
name: Voltaire

quote: Let no rank puff up anyone; for faith and love are paramount - the greatest blessings in the world.

quote: Faith is different from proof; the latter is human, the former is a Gift from God.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: A man of courage is also full of faith.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: A better world shall emerge based on faith and understanding.
name: Douglas MacArthur

quote: Reason is the enemy of faith.
name: Martin Luther

quote: Trust is not the same as faith. A friend is someone you trust. Putting faith in anyone is a mistake.
name: Christopher Hitchens

quote: If you believe in God, He will open the windows of heaven and pour blessings upon you.
name: Mahalia Jackson

quote: If you think you can win, you can win. Faith is necessary to victory.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: Faith may be defined briefly as an illogical belief in the occurrence of the improbable.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: Faith embraces many truths which seem to contradict each other.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: Believers, look up - take courage. The angels are nearer than you think.
name: Billy Graham

quote: Seeds of faith are always within us; sometimes it takes a crisis to nourish and encourage their growth.

quote: Choosing an attitude of faith will release peace out of your spirit and into your soul.

quote: Faith is easy; I think people complicate it.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: My reason nourishes my faith and my faith my reason.
name: Norman Cousins

quote: Only our individual faith in freedom can keep us free.
name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

name: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: I have come to the conclusion that the most important element in human life is faith.

quote: Even if a unity of faith is not possible, a unity of love is.

quote: There lives more faith in honest doubt, believe me, than in half the creeds.

quote: Life's a fight. It's a good fight of faith.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: You can judge the quality of their faith from the way they behave. Discipline is an index to doctrine.
name: Tertullian

quote: Life is doubt, and faith without doubt is nothing but death.
name: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: There's a huge amount of faith and confidence in the stunt team.
name: Jason Statham

name: Julia Cameron

quote: You just have to have a simple faith.
name: Jimmy Carter

name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: God never made a promise that was too good to be true.
name: Dwight L. Moody

quote: If you have God on your side, everything becomes clear.
name: Ayrton Senna

quote: Faith which does not doubt is dead faith.
name: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: If you want to lose your faith, make friends with a priest.
name: George Gurdjieff

quote: My faith is the grand drama of my life. I'm a believer, so I sing words of God to those who have no faith.

quote: Evolution and creationism both require faith. It's just a matter of where you choose to place that faith.

quote: Our faith is released as we say, pray and do the Word.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: My faith always has been and always will be important to me.
name: Aretha Franklin

quote: I can't prove it scientifically, that there's a God, but I believe.
name: Billy Graham

quote: I have faith that God often uses our deepest pain as the launching pad of our greatest calling.

quote: An Adult faith does not follow the waves of fashion and the latest novelties.
name: Pope Benedict XVI

quote: Art requires neither complaisance nor politeness; nothing but faith, faith and freedom.
name: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Faith means belief in something concerning which doubt is theoretically possible.
name: William James

quote: That willing suspension of disbelief for the moment, which constitutes poetic faith.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: Fear clogs; faith liberates.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Faith is the state of being ultimately concerned.
name: Paul Tillich

quote: Faith is an act of a finite being who is grasped by, and turned to, the infinite.
name: Paul Tillich

quote: I consider myself a Christian. I attend church. My faith has sustained me in very difficult times.
name: John McCain

quote: A faith is a necessity to a man. Woe to him who believes in nothing.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: I have tremendous faith in President Obama's skills. He's a long-term visionary.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: Science stands for rational thought, faith for superstition and unreason.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: Duty cannot exist without faith.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: To me faith means not worrying.
name: John Dewey

quote: Faith, culture, structure and guidance are good things.
name: Bethenny Frankel

quote: The man of science has learned to believe in justification, not by faith, but by verification.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: To study history means submitting to chaos and nevertheless retaining faith in order and meaning.
name: Hermann Hesse

quote: I have faith in faith. God is there, whether we have faith or not, so why not have faith in him?
name: Valerie Bertinelli

quote: Faith and doubt cannot exist in the same mind at the same time, for one will dispel the other.
name: Thomas S. Monson

quote: We may not only find faith in God in our sorrow. We may also become faithful to Him in times of calm.
name: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Faith is the ticket to the feast, not the feast.
name: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: I want to be remembered as the person who helped us restore faith in ourselves.
name: Wilma Mankiller

quote: Our faith is faith in someone else's faith, and in the greatest matters this is most the case.
name: William James

quote: Knowledge is only one half. Faith is the other.
name: Novalis

quote: It's attractive when girls have faith. That is a big thing for me.
name: Tim Tebow

quote: Our religion does not discriminate according to color, sex or anything else. What counts is piety and faith.
name: Hussein of Jordan

quote: For modes of faith let graceless zealots fight, His can't be wrong whose life is in the right.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: Faith is the heroism of the intellect.
name: Charles Henry Parkhurst

quote: I am one of those who would rather sink with faith than swim without it.
name: Stanley Baldwin

quote: I hope I can live up to the faith that has been put in me to do a good job.
name: Clementa C. Pinckney

quote: Faith is not a sense, nor sight, nor reason, but taking God at His work.
name: Faith Evans

quote: Is it faith to understand nothing, and merely submit your convictions implicitly to the Church?
name: John Calvin

quote: He wants you all to Himself to put His loving, divine arms around you.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: I've had faith my whole life that there was someone looking out for me, a spirit guide, a soul guide.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: If you desire faith, then you have faith enough.
name: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: Erosion of faith and trust in government - that is the real problem that confronts us.
name: Rodrigo Duterte

quote: With His love, you can wake up every day with an attitude of faith and expectancy.
name: Victoria Osteen

quote: Base souls have no faith in great individuals.
name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Faith is love taking the form of aspiration.
name: William Ellery Channing

quote: Fight the good fight of faith, and God will give you spiritual mercies.
name: George Whitefield

quote: Faith, sir, we are here today, and gone tomorrow.
name: Aphra Behn

quote: Faith, like a jackal, feeds among the tombs, and even from these dead doubts she gathers her most vital hope.
name: Herman Melville

quote: I don't have faith in young people any more. I don't waste time trying to communicate with them.
name: Vivienne Westwood

quote: In a democracy, dissent is an act of faith.
name: J. William Fulbright

quote: You block your dream when you allow your fear to grow bigger than your faith.
name: Mary Manin Morrissey

quote: At the heart of Christian faith is the story of Jesus' death and resurrection.
name: John Ortberg

quote: Morals are built on religious faith. Virtue is built on morality and influences a culture.
name: Michele Bachmann

quote: It's OK to be outspoken about your faith.
name: Tim Tebow

quote: Worry is spiritual short sight. Its cure is intelligent faith.
name: Paul Brunton

quote: The enemy is not Islam, the great world faith, but a perversion of Islam.
name: John Cornyn

quote: The principle of acting in good faith is at the heart of decent work.
name: Richard Eyre

quote: I think it's imperative to have faith or religion, because it's good to have morals, to be kind to others.
name: Tinie Tempah

quote: Red Sox fans have been pushed to the brink over the years, but that's how faith grows stronger.
name: Julianna Baggott

quote: Treat the audience with respect and maturity, and have a certain faith in them to catch up.
name: Duncan Jones

quote: American government was founded on a belief and a faith in God and in doing what is right and just.
name: Ginny Brown-Waite

quote: All the faith and good will in the world is wasted without direction.
name: Bill Owens

quote: The substance of faith is a hope in the unseen.
name: Ron Suskind

quote: I ground my faith upon God's word, and not upon the church.
name: Jane Grey

quote: Faith, to my mind, is a stiffening process, a sort of mental starch.
name: E. M. Forster

quote: How many things we held yesterday as articles of faith which today we tell as fables.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Faith is spiritualized imagination.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: If I were dying, my last words would be: Have faith and pursue the unknown end.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: If there was no faith there would be no living in this world. We could not even eat hash with any safety.
name: Josh Billings

quote: Pray in faith.
name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Hope, like faith, is nothing if it is not courageous; it is nothing if it is not ridiculous.
name: Thornton Wilder

quote: I respect faith, but doubt is what gives you an education.
name: Wilson Mizner

quote: Above all, cancer is a spiritual practice that teaches me about faith and resilience.
name: Kris Carr

quote: Asking in faith requires honesty, effort, commitment, and persistence.
name: David A. Bednar

quote: Every man eventually is backed up to the wall of faith, and there he must make his stand.
name: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: Far too many candidates wear their faith on their sleeve.
name: Ted Cruz

quote: Writing fiction has become a priestly business in countries that have lost their faith.
name: Gore Vidal

quote: Faith is never identical with piety.
name: Karl Barth

quote: Charity can be the outward expression of faith and hope.
name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: We see ourselves in terms of yesterday and today. Our Heavenly Father sees us in terms of forever.
name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: The Resurrection is at the core of our beliefs as Christians. Without it, our faith is meaningless.
name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: Too often today, we do not rely on faith so much as on our own ability to reason and solve problems.
name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: Often what passes for faith in this world is little more than gullibility.
name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: I believe though I do not comprehend, and I hold by faith what I cannot grasp with the mind.
name: Saint Bernard

quote: Faith is the confidence, the assurance, the enforcing truth, the knowing.
name: Robert Collier

quote: Number one is my faith, number two my family, number three is my friends, and number four, my fans.
name: Jim Kelly

quote: The Bible is our rule of faith and doctrine.
name: Ellen G. White

quote: 'Faith and Will' sprang from my personal experience with passing through a dark spiritual time.
name: Julia Cameron

quote: I try to stay centered in my faith and my family and the close people around me.
name: Tim Tebow

quote: I think poetry's always a kind of faith. It is the kind that I have.
name: Natasha Trethewey

quote: I would not attack the faith of a heathen without being sure I had a better one to put in its place.
name: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quote: Flatter not thyself in thy faith in God if thou hast not charity for thy neighbor.
name: Francis Quarles

quote: Why should any man have power over any other man's faith, seeing Christ Himself is the author of it?
name: George Fox

quote: My faith, my family, my friends - that's where I get my strength.
name: Dana Loesch

quote: Faith is like a kernel of wheat.
name: Joe Bob Briggs

quote: Know why you believe, understand what you believe, and possess a reason for the faith that is in you.
name: Frances Wright

quote: I try to go with the flow and have faith that everything is going to work out.
name: Bryce Dallas Howard

quote: Faith is not a thing which one 'loses', we merely cease to shape our lives by it.
name: Georges Bernanos

quote: Have faith in your intuition and listen to your gut feeling.
name: Ann Cotton

quote: Faith is not belief without proof, but trust without reservation.
name: D. Elton Trueblood

quote: Fear is the denomination of the Old Testament; belief is the denomination of the New.
name: Benjamin Whichcote

quote: I am sorry for causing anyone to lose faith in sport.
name: Lizzie Armitstead

quote: We need a dose of doubt and a dose of faith, to challenge each other.
name: Elif Safak

quote: God continues to work miracles in my life.
name: Willie Aames

quote: Vision looks upward and becomes faith.
name: Stephen Samuel Wise

quote: But I don't necessarily define my faith by going to church every Sunday.
name: Miley Cyrus

quote: Faith is the very first thing you should pack in a hope chest.
name: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quote: Of all the things Christ wants for us, loving Him and focusing our attention on Him are the most important.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: Every life is a profession of faith, and exercises an inevitable and silent influence.
name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Society lives by faith, and develops by science.
name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: He who is not impressed by sound advice, lacks faith.
name: Abu Bakr

quote: Of all duties, prayer certainly is the sweetest and most easy.
name: Laurence Sterne

quote: Not truth, but faith, it is that keeps the world alive.
name: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: Have faith in God; God has faith in you.
name: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: True faith is belief in the reality of absolute values.
name: William Inge

quote: The dearest friend on earth is a mere shadow compared to Jesus Christ.
name: Oswald Chambers

quote: We are a long time in learning that all our strength and salvation is in God.
name: David Brainerd

quote: All that I am I owe to Jesus Christ, revealed to me in His divine Book.
name: David Livingstone

quote: The power of faith will often shine forth the most when the character is naturally weak.
name: Augustus Hare

quote: My main focus in sobriety has been to replace fear with faith or love.
name: Steve-O

quote: It's okay to have faith in something that you can't see or touch.
name: Chad Kroeger

quote: It is not reason which makes faith hard, but life.
name: Jean Ingelow

quote: I seek a deeper truth, but I don't think I have to go to a building designated for worship to find it.
name: Ted Lange

quote: In the light of faith I am strong, constant, and persevering.
name: Catherine of Siena

quote: Faith is reason grown courageous.
name: Sherwood Eddy

quote: Faith is not contrary to reason.
name: Sherwood Eddy

quote: I think the greatest taboos in America are faith and failure.
name: Michael Malone
